email_body: Do you have interest in having a semi formal party at the guggenheim for our ny counterparties? was thinking it might be a good pr move. ---------------------- Forwarded by John Arnold/HOU/ECT on 03/20/2001 09:35 PM --------------------------- From: Margaret Allen@ENRON on 03/19/2001 05:23 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: Guggenheim Museum There will be a corporate lounge for you to congregate in. Does that sound good? No problem on the thrity tickets. I will hold them for you. Let me know if you don't think yo uwill be needing all of them. I can also get you the formal invitations to send out if you would like.
